almost.functional.reactive
Class BroadcastObserver<T>

java.lang.Object
  almost.functional.reactive.BroadcastObserver<T>
Type Parameters:
T - type being observed
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer<T>
public class BroadcastObserver<T>
extends Object
implements Observer<T>

A single Observer that allow for multiple Observers to observe a single event. Once this Observer is completed all the various consumers are released.

See Also:
Observer, Consumer
